## ouroctl apply screen-configs

Apply screen configurations from JSON file

### Synopsis

Apply UI screen configurations from a JSON file to customize the OuroPlatform interface.

```
ouroctl apply screen-configs [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Apply screen configs from a json file
  ouroctl apply screen-configs --file screen-configs.json
```

### Options

```
  -f, --file string   Path to the template file to apply
  -h, --help          help for screen-configs
```
